Question
========
  
Which of the following variables is not a continuous variable? 
Answerlist
----------
* The time required to solve a sum.
* Temperature.
* Weight.
* Number of children per family. 

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Time is a continuous variable. 3.5 minutes or 6.93 seconds are possible values.
* Temperature is a continuous variable. It could be 13.5 degrees outside or the oven could be 181.7 degrees hot.
* Weight is a continuous variable. A person could weigh 71.7 pounds or you could have 145.6 grams of sugar left in the bag.
* This answer is correct. We are counting the number of children. This is a discrete variable.
